admin-settings-custom-fields.custom-fields-desc: You can define custom fields for Contacts here. They appear in new contact form in Agile and can also be updated using our API.
admin-settings-custom-fields.agile-provides-the-following-custom-fiel: Agile provides the following custom field types:
admin-settings-custom-fields.text-field-desc: Text field - A simple text field
admin-settings-custom-fields.date-field-desc: Date field - A calendar date input field. (If you are providing this field value through API, provide an epoch number)
admin-settings-custom-fields.list-field-desc: List field - A drop down list option
admin-settings-custom-fields.check-box-desc: Check box - A true/false check box option
admin-settings-custom-fields.text-area-desc: Text area -A large text input field
admin-settings-custom-fields.formula-desc: Formula - An arithmetic formula in following format {{number1}}*{{number2}} - works with numerical custom fields only. Mustache conditions can be used here.
admin-settings-custom-fields.custom-fields-help-text: Enabling the 'Searchable' option in the custom field dialog will allow you to search contacts in Agile using the custom field value.
admin-settings-custom-fields.custom-field-cond-desc: For the custom field to be sortable, searchable checkbox must be selected.
admin-settings-custom-fields.note-for-date-custom-fields: Note : For date custom fields, the field value if provided using the API, should be an epoch number.

admin-settings-deals.tracks-and-milestones-desc-1: Tracks are sales processes. Use tracks to correspond to particular products or services offered by your company, or set up tracks to be used in deals with customers, partners, resellers, etc. When you create a new deal, you choose which track to associate it with.
admin-settings-deals.tracks-and-milestones-desc-2: Milestones define the status of deals in a particular track. You can create any number of custom milestones in a track. Common milestones include 'New', 'In Progress',  'Won' or  'Lost'. When you associate a deal with a track, that deal will typically need to go through all of the track's milestones to be completed or finalized.
admin-settings-deals.won-message: Deals with this milestone are considered as Won.
admin-settings-deals.lost-message: Deals with this milestone are considered as Lost.
admin-settings-deals.spl-chars-not-allowed-msg: Special characters are not allowed other than underscore, space and hyphen.
admin-settings-deals.milestone-with-this-name-exists: Milestone with this name already exists.
admin-settings-deals.reason-with-this-name-exists: Reason with this name already exists.
admin-settings-deals.source-with-this-name-exists: Source with this name already exists.
admin-settings-deals.loss-reason-name-cond-desc: Loss reason name should start with an alphabet and can not contain special characters other than underscore, space and hyphen.
admin-settings-deals.source-name-desc: Source name should start with an alphabet and can not contain special characters other than underscore, space and hyphen.

admin-settings-integrations.sendgrid-content: Send your emails via your SendGrid account. Sendgrid is a reliable platform to deliver transactional and marketing emails.
admin-settings-integrations.amazon-content: Amazon SES is an easy and cost-effective email gateway service to send automated emails to your customers.
admin-settings-integrations.twilio-content: Twilio provides APIs for text messages and VoIP. Use your Twilio account to send SMS from Campaigns.
admin-settings-integrations.please-upgrade-to-regular-or-enterprise-: Please upgrade to Regular or Enterprise plan
admin-settings-integrations.plivo-content: Plivo provides Voice and SMS API for businesses of all sizes.  Use your Plivo account to send SMS from Campaigns.
admin-settings-integrations.send-grid-note: Note: Emails with attachments are currently not supported by the SendGrid integration. They are sent via Agile's default email gateway.
admin-settings-integrations.amazon-note-1: 1. Amazon SES services require verification of email addresses in the From field of sent emails. Please ensure that you verify the email addresses of all your Agile CRM users and the From addresses of all your campaign emails.
admin-settings-integrations.amazon-note-2: 2. If you are sending bulk emails, ensure that your SES account has the required sending capacity. Agile does NOT queue your emails.
admin-settings-integrations.you-need-a-paid-plivo-account: You need a Paid Plivo account to be able to send SMS

admin-settings-api-analytics.api-key-desc: API key for REST clients (Java, PHP, .Net wrappers) and integrations (Zapier, Wufoo, Unbounce, Chrome extension and others).
admin-settings-api-analytics.js-api-key-desc: Javascript API key only for tracking code on website.
admin-settings-api-analytics.analytics-code-desc: You can use javascript API to track page views on your site, add / delete contacts from your website or blog directly. Copy and paste the below code in your webpage's HTML just before the  tag to enable tracking / API methods.
admin-settings-api-analytics.tracking-code-with-web-rules-enabled: Tracking code with Web Rules enabled
admin-settings-api-analytics.tracking-code-with-web-rules-whitelist-e: Tracking code with Web Rules Whitelist enabled
admin-settings-api-analytics.allowed-domains-desc: API & Analytics will be enabled on following domains. All domains are allowed by default using wildcard
admin-settings-api-analytics.ip-filters-desc: By creating IP filters you can disable Web Stats and Tracking.
admin-settings-api-analytics.desc-1: Agile supports open standard REST. You can use any language which supports REST.
admin-settings-api-analytics.desc-2: We currently have the following libraries for your convenience
admin-settings-api-analytics.we-will-be-publishing-api: We will be publishing API for other languages very soon.
admin-settings-api-analytics.desc-3: To enable on domain eg: https://www.example.com and its subdomain eg: https://test.example.com you can add the hostname i.e example.com.
admin-settings-api-analytics.desc-4: To allow only on a particular subdomain eg: https://test.example.com please add as test.example.com or *.example.com.
admin-settings-api-analytics.ip-filters-help-1: To disable tracking on a particular IP address, add as eg: 192.168.1.1 and also you can specify range of IP addresses using wildcard character * as 192.168.1.* | 192.168.*.* | 192.*.*.*
admin-settings-api-analytics.ip-filters-help-2: To block tracking from all IP Addresses a Filter can be added as *.*.*.*

admin-settings-stats.emails-alert: Important: Emails from your account are blocked due to poor reputation. Please contact our support team if you wish to correct this.
admin-settings-stats.amazon-stats-msg: Amazon SES stats are shown here
admin-settings-stats.sms-msg: Agile CRM supports mobile messaging.You can configure the SMS feature here

admin-settings-stats.this-can-happen-for-various-reasons: This can happen for various reasons including incorrect number, improper number format, queue overflows or  account suspensions. Twilio does not charge you for failed messages.

admin-settings-stats.message-could-not-be-sent-desc: The message could not be sent. This can happen for various reasons including queue overflows, account suspensions. Twilio does not charge you for failed messages.

plan-and-upgrade.ron-kaplan-desc-1: Agile CRM is an exciting and powerful system. The capability to create complex workflows is immensely useful and easy - simply a matter of drag and drop.
plan-and-upgrade.gary-tramer-desc-1: Agile CRM is the coolest, easiest and by far the most productive CRM I've ever used. Within 20 minutes we had customized the CRM and sent out a complex outbound email campaign. We're already converting our leads. Insane!

plan-and-upgrade.paul-singh-desc-1: For a startup that relies a lot on on-line business, Agile CRM has been an invaluable team to our sales team as it integrates many capabilities out-of-the-box.

widgets.account-sid-validation: Account SID starts with AC and length should be 34.
widgets.twilio-numbers-tooltip: To receive incoming calls in Agile, you need to select a Twilio number. A Twilio number is one that you have purchased through Twilio. This number will also be the caller ID for outgoing calls  (unless you select a different caller ID from the option below).
widgets.verified-caller-ids-tooltip: A verified phone number is one that you can use as your Caller ID when making outbound calls with Twilio. Agile will use this number as the Caller ID. Incoming calls on this number will NOT come to Agile.
widgets.redirect-twimlet-url-tooltip: This Twimlet URL will be called when you are not available. Twimlets allow you to setup Forwarding, Voicemail etc.

report-chart-forms.companies-are-prospects-that-you-interac: companies are prospects that you interact with using Agile.
report-chart-forms.funnel-report-graphically-shows-desc: Funnel report graphically shows you how leads are passing through various stages in your sales cycle. For each Stage you need to have Tags added in Agile. For example, you can have Tags like Lead, Qualified, Opportunity, Converted - for all contacts in Agile, that reflect their state. You can then create a Funnel Graph on those tags.
report-chart-forms.growth-graphs-allow-desc: Growth graphs allow you to see how Contacts/leads with particular Tags are getting added over time.
report-chart-forms.growth-graphs-desc: For example, if you are adding a 'Lead' tag to all leads/contacts that you add (or get pushed via API), then you can create a Growth Graph on that tag, to see how many leads you get daily/weekly/monthly over time. You can apply additional Filters when you see the graph. Say you have a filter defined for all leads from a particular source (they may have a particular Tag or custom filed value). You can apply that filter on the graph and see how leads from the source are growing.
report-chart-forms.ratio-graph-desc: Ratio graph allow to compare two Tags over time. This allows you to do reports like percentage conversions from one stage to another (represented by Tags). For example, if you have a 'Lead' tag for all new contacts and an 'Opportunity' tag for all qualified Opportunities, a Ratio graph between these tags tells you what percentage of Leads that have come in the specified period (day/week/month), have converted into an Opportunity later. You can apply Filters for more insightful information. If you have a Filter that gives you leads from a particular source, then applying the filter on the above Ratio report will tell you how many Leads coming from the particular source have converted into an opportunity.
